description:
Nene`s Gothita was revealed just before the start of the Renri Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She obtained it some time before the Tripokalon but after her last encounter with Serena at the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament.
It participated in the Renri Town Tripokalon Tournament`s first stage theme performance where it performed while making Pofflés and Meowth noted that the colors used on the Pofflé where the colors gothlolis use. It also participated in the free performances but it wasn`t good enough to defeat Jessie to get the Princess Key.
name: Gothimu (Nene)
